message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate! However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $13500. It's a fair price, considering the value you'll get from the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $13500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12500 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand that $12500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13000. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
